Has anyone here ever used, or known someone who has used, a MEL-8704REM?

 bought one recently, but have not had a chance to use it since I have
resi=
gned from the group I was investigating with. It was a little pricey
(for m=
e), and I'd like to know if it's worth keeping or should I sell it
and try =
one of these others that y'all are talking about? Thanks,

Jan

ith it.

n!

e Trifield in Magnetic mode. If the box is stable and

gnetized

ause this too

next to

ly has one plane of
reading,

fields. The natural
trifield
> >> only
> >> measures the plane that extends=
 from the top and bottom edges
lengthwise
> >> from the devices. So if you =
have the device sitting upright, you
will
> >> only

s above the device. If you have it laying flat,
you
> >> will

to measure the full plane of length extending beyond the
bottom
> >> and
> =
>> top edges. Therefore, it is best to use this device slightly
elevated an=
d
> >> laying flat.

zing results thus far.
While

ed properly, when a
"spirit"

can get conversations that

periences this only 6 times in all the
years

 Most of the time, this device yields a single
alarm,
